instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924 2015 MBP13 PWR-BTN issue
threads.message:
Hi Guys

I have this MacBook Pro 13-inch 2015 which came in with dead trackpad and dead keyboard. After switching trackpad cable the keyboard and trackpad came to life.

But the issue is now that it won't turn on by normal press on power button while on battery power. I need to keep the power button pushed for about 5-6 seconds to hear the chime. After this it starts and everything seems normal.

If the AC adapter is connected I can start by normal short press on the power button though.

The board has no liquid damage and customer says that keyboard and trackpad suddenly just stopped responding.

Anyone have an idea to were to look?

threads.title: 820-4924 2015 MBP13 PWR-BTN issue
threads.message: Run diagnostic, hold "D" after press power button and see if report any issue about battery.....

threads.title: 820-4924 2015 MBP13 PWR-BTN issue
threads.message: You can just check the battery status in the OS. I bet it will say "replace now"

threads.title: 820-4924 2015 MBP13 PWR-BTN issue
threads.message:
Battery was not saying replace and did not fail on "D-diagnostics". I gave the computer back to customer. He needed it urgently so he must live with holding the power button for now. We'll see if it comes back :D

Thanks
